name: Cuflex! [FOR CONTROLLER AND KEYBOARD]
description: This Game Tests Your Reflexes By Throwing Bowling Balls At Your Player. Now Where Do Reflexes Come In? We Give You An Option Of Moving Left With A, Or Moving Right With D. If Your Reflexes Get A Bit Too Unhurried, You Can Take A Break And Exit The Game With Esc.  But, BUT If You Catch Yourself In A Stick Situation, Click S To Stop Moving. One More Thing... I Like To Call This The Simplest Hardest Game I Know.  Now If You're On Controller, Take This: This Game Tests Your Reflexes By Throwing Bowling Balls At Your Player. Now Where Do Reflexes Come In? We Give You An Option Of Moving Left With L1, Or Moving Right With R1. If Your Reflexes Get A Bit Too Unhurried, You Can Take A Break And Exit The Game With The Circle Button. But, BUT If You Catch Yourself In A Sticky Situation, Haha, You Cant Stop. As I Said, I Like To Call This The Simplest Hardest Game I Know. Happy Reflexes!
